blurb: WebSocket applications have never been this simple before. Just receive messages by subscribing to events such as "json" in Mojo::Transaction::WebSocket with "on" in Mojolicious::Controller and return them with "send" in Mojolicious::Controller.
subtitle: WebSockets
html: WebSocket applications have never been this simple before. Just receive messages by subscribing to events such as "json" in Mojo::Transaction::WebSocket with "on" in Mojolicious::Controller and return them with "send" in Mojolicious::Controller.
